page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATE -1
page.content: Mum wakes me up at 7.30am and she brings me a cup of tea. I drink it slowly, get up, get dressed and go down to{breakfast.}I have{cereal mostly Coco Pops or frosties. Then I go to see my ponies and give them a few titbits and muck them out. I brush my hair then say goodbye to my brother James who goes to{school}at 8.00am. Then I do my piano practise for ten minutes. I clean my teeth, wash my face then to to school on the bus. When we arrive at school we stay outside for a while then the bell rings and we go in class for{lessons. Mrs. Pickford discusses our work schedules, writes on the board what we have got to do that day then start working on our various activities. 10.25am We go out to play for 15 minutes. I play with Michelle and a few others and we just watch the boys
